name: MeuralCanvas
0:
”Alexa, turn off canvas”
”Alexa, brighten canvas to fifty percent”
”Alexa, next on canvas”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: digital canvas
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Meural Canvas is a Wi-Fi connected digital Canvas allowing for display artworks from the Meural platform. It is required to obtain the Meural Canvas, register the device under your Meural account and connect it to a network. Then, enable the Meural Canvas skill for Amazon Alexa, login with your Meural credentials, and discover you devices. Now, you can control your Meural Canvas with the following options:
- To turn on your Meural Canvas, say: "Alexa, turn on canvas"
- To turn off your Meural Canvas, say: "Alexa, turn off canvas" 
- Set brightness of the screen, say: "Alexa, brighten canvas to fifty percent"
- To show next image, say: "Alexa, next on canvas" or "Alexa, ask digital canvas to show next image on canvas"
- To show previous image, say: "Alexa, previous on canvas" or "Alexa, ask digital canvas to show previous image on canvas"
